attributes.action: The Florence speech has left the BREXIT leavers betrayed, this is OUR orders
attributes.additional_details: MRS. MAY's Florence speech, LBC viewers views on Nigel Farage show and personal views
attributes.background:
These are the orders:

1.Transition period – 6 months MAXIMUM
2. BREXIT BILL – NONE
3. ALL fishing waters are RETURNED to the UK
4. NO European court oversight
5. IF the EU negotiators continue to DISRESPECT our negotiators then the UK WALKS OUT immediately.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/201145

Alternatively, you could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
